abstract: A popular Saudi video blogger was detained this week, along with his crew, after his report on poverty in the kingdom's capital, Riyadh, was viewed hundreds of thousands of times on YouTube, human rights activists said.
snippet: A popular Saudi video blogger was detained this week, along with his crew, after his report on poverty in the kingdom's capital, Riyadh, was viewed hundreds of thousands of times on YouTube, human rights activists said.

headline.main: Saudi Video Blogger Reportedly Detained for Showing Poverty in Riyadh
